title: Candy Crush Saga V1.22.1[Mod]
description:
Switch and match your way through more than 400 levels in this delicious and addictive puzzle adventure. Ain't it the sweetest game ever?
Please note Candy Crush Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.
The super hit game Candy Crush Saga is now available for Android phones and tablets!

Join Tiffi and Mr. Toffee in their epic adventure through a world full of candy.
Take on this deliciously sweet saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
